Headline: Kingdom of Israel Established
Text: Traditional date for the establishment of the Kingdom of Israel under King Saul.

Headline: Fall of the Northern Kingdom
Text: Assyrian conquest leads to the fall of the Northern Kingdom of Israel.

Headline: Babylonian Exile
Text: The Babylonian Empire destroys the First Temple in Jerusalem; beginning of the Babylonian Exile.

Headline: Persian Rule and Return
Text: Persian King Cyrus the Great conquers Babylon and allows Jews to return and rebuild the Temple.

Headline: Hellenistic Rule
Text: Alexander the Great conquers the Persian Empire

Headline: Maccabean Revolt
Text: The Maccabean Revolt against Hellenistic rule leads to a period of Jewish sovereignty.

Headline: Roman Conquest
Text: Roman conquest of Judea.

Headline: Destruction of the Second Temple
Text: Roman forces destroy the Second Temple in Jerusalem; start of a significant Jewish diaspora.

Headline: Bar Kokhba Revolt
Text: The Bar Kokhba Revolt against Roman rule.

Headline: Arab Conquest
Text: Arab conquest of the region; beginning of Muslim rule.

Headline: Crusader Rule
Text: Crusaders capture Jerusalem; start of Christian rule in the Holy Land.

Headline: Expulsion from England
Text: Jews are expelled from England

Headline: Expulsion from Spain
Text: Jews are expelled from Spain; many Sephardic Jews migrate to the Ottoman Empire

Headline: Ottoman Rule
Text: The Ottoman Empire conquers the region

Headline: First Aliyah
Text: The First Aliyah begins

Headline: Balfour Declaration
Text: The Balfour Declaration supports the establishment of a "national home for the Jewish people" in Palestine.

Headline: Establishment of Israel
Text: The State of Israel is declared

Headline: Israeli War of Independence
Text: Following the declaration of the State of Israel

Headline: Suez Crisis
Text: Israel

Headline: Six-Day War
Text: Israel fights against Egypt

Headline: Yom Kippur War
Text: Egypt and Syria launch a surprise attack against Israel on Yom Kippur

Headline: Lebanon War
Text: Israel invades southern Lebanon in response to attacks by the PLO.

Headline: Lebanon War
Text: Conflict between Israel and Hezbollah in Lebanon.

Headline: Gaza War (Operation Cast Lead)
Text: Israel launches a military operation in the Gaza Strip against Hamas.

Headline: Operation Pillar of Defense
Text: Israel's operation in the Gaza Strip aimed at stopping rocket fire from Hamas.

Headline: Operation Protective Edge
Text: A seven-week conflict between Israel and Hamas in the Gaza Strip.

Headline: Operation Swords of Iron
Text: Ongoing conflict between Hamas and Israel in the Gaza Strip
